channel.title: +1 Forward - BOB Series - Grand Guignol
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-bob-the-grand-guignol
Rach and Rich continue their Summer Series. This series covers games in the Belonging Outside Belonging (BOB) style of PbtA games. This fifth episode features Luke of Games from the Wildwood.
**Timecodes:** 0:01:48 - Spend a Token... to hear Luke talk about Setting Elements and Moves 0:11:34 - You Also Play As The... person learning about *Grand Guignol* 0:18:24 - No Dice, No Masters... a demo of Setting Elements in *Grand Guignol*
Luke's Itch store can be found here: https://gamesfromthewildwood.itch.io/
Luke is part of the podcast Feelings First: https://soundcloud.com/feelingsfirst
